title: DJ Sona + Howling abyss death screen music bug. 100% reproduction steps
body:
Bug: while playing on the Howling Abyss map and listening to DJ sonas music, the death screen still plays the howling abysses death music overtop of her tunes. this is very audibly dissonant. This will occur for any player on sonas team who is in the black and white death screen, including sona herself

repro steps
1. load a game on howling abyss using any champion (including sona herself)
2. have a sona on your team using the DJ skin.
3. Opt into her music via tab and clicking the music icon
4. if you yourself die, the howling abyss "death" music will play along side sona's electronic music

its worth noting that this will still happen if you are playing sona, though it becomes less dissonant because when she dies, some of her musical layers fall off. still kind of annoying.

possible solution: do some programming magic that makes it so ALL howling abyss music files are disabled while opting into DJ sona's jams.
{{champion:37}}
